phrase.text:
Our camp is under attack!

There is a powerful hero riding a white horse that is leading the assault!

Our troops don't stand a chance.

As you can see, not all warriors are the same. Some have more combat experience, whilst others are simply recruits.\n\nThe level of a warrior indicates his experience. The higher his level, the more effective he will be in combat.
Warriors assigned to a hero fight as if part of the hero's experience was theirs.\n\nWhen you select the hero, the assigned warriors have yellow circles around their feet.
What a shame, the battle will be over before we get there.\n\nI'll send a message to Rome asking for reinforcements.
